alterniumInfo.name: Killing Spree
alterniumInfo.description: CRIT DMG +40%, ATK +40% added to Lv.5 Passive Skill effect, Lv.5 Passive Skill effect reactivates after Special and Ultimate Skills are activated.

reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Summary","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Amy Firstwing (Amy) is a PVP-oriented backline damage dealer. Her most notable feature is a long range Enters The Battlefield (ETB) pull combined with skill seal effect, that can drag snipers, rangers and supporters into vulnerable melee-range positions. Additionally, her Special and Ultimate Skills apply strong max HP% damage over time debuffs, execute low hp enemies and skill seal.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Amy’s Alternium Reactor addresses her middling personal damage output by granting near-permanent self-buffs: 40% ATK, 40% CRIT DMG, 25% ASPD, and Hitstun Immunity (Special Tier). This increases Amy’s damage output to acceptable levels and provides limited protection against backline disruption.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVE Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Amy’s utility in PVE is severely limited, as her max HP% damage effects do not apply to boss-type enemies. While niche scenarios could theoretically leverage her kit, she currently lacks practical viability in any PVE content.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVP Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, Amy is a specialised anti-backline tech option that aims to swing the boardstate by pulling enemy backline threats to the forefront. While she deals serviceable damage after her ETB effect and applies high uptime skill seal to enemy frontline units, her short range necessitates heavy team support for survival.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"However, her core mechanic faces multiple reliability challenges:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"HIT and EVA interaction:","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"  Amy’s low HIT stat sets a low evasion threshold (957) for targets to resist her pull, easily met by most backline units.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Hitstun protection:","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Units with Special-tier (or higher) Hitstun Immunity (e.g., Lee Yuri) or mid-skill casting ignore her pull. Timing inconsistencies further reduce reliability.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Knockback immunity:","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Immovable units (e.g., Curian) negate her repositioning entirely.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Counter Units: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Awakened Joo Shiyoon and Awakened Ray can directly counter her ETB pull.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Class lock:","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Strategies not reliant on Rangers, Snipers and Supporters (e.g. Replacer King) nullify this aspect of Amy’s kit. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"While tools like Enterprise/Ahab ships or Moneka/Estella Priest Jung Dain operators can mitigate HIT deficiencies, this further strains overall team composition in order to enable a reactive effect. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Amy’s survivability hinges on her Special Skill providing a 30% max HP shield and repositioning effect. Both mechanics are exploitable: shields are vulnerable to barrier disruption (e.g. Awakened Karin Wong, Awakened Na Yubin), and her retreat can be reversed by deploying units behind her.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In summary, Amy contradictory demands both significant resource allocation to enable her disruptive potential, and the rest of the team performing well in situations where her kit is not relevant.\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ETB Pull","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can permanently skill seal a single frontline unit","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A Ranged AoE attacker effective against other attackers

introduction.introduction:
Amy Firstwing is a Sniper who uses strings to cut through enemies and control those that have survived.

  The strange way she dresses and behaves points at something very specific, but no one knows what. More accurately, anyone who tried to look into her past has disappeared without a trace. According to witness testimonies, she's careless, impatient, crass, and antisocial.
  But her actual record shows she's a meticulous specialist who leaves no loose ends. So, which one is the real her?

baseDescription.baseDescription: Violently swings her yoyo, inflicting AoE damage.

Inflicts AoE damage in front upon deployment. Pulls Rangers, Snipers, and Supporters within range and seals their skills for 8 seconds. (Bosses excluded) Negates CRIT. Basic attacks always crit, but not for 4 seconds after Special skill.

level5.level5: ASPD +25% and immunity to Hitstun from Ultimate or lower skills for 10 s after deployment

baseDescription.baseDescription: Throws her yoyo, inflicting AoE damage in front. Enters Sure Fire mode for this skill's duration. The affected targets lose 1% of HP every second for 20 seconds. (Bosses excluded) Pulls the farthest target and seals its skills for 12 seconds (Bosses excluded), or instantly kills it if its HP is 30% or below (Bosses excluded).

level5.level5: A barrier by 15% of Max HP for 10 s when cast

baseDescription.baseDescription: Pulls enemies in front with her yoyo string and inflicts AoE damage. The affected targets lose 1.5% of HP every second for 20 seconds. (Bosses excluded) Seals the skills of 2 farthest targets for 8 seconds (Bosses included), or instantly kills them if their HP is 40% or below (Bosses excluded).
